Package com.boatcorp.boatgame.entities

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • com.boatcorp.boatgame.entities.Bullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable
    public class Bullet
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
    Creates a Bullet object which contains relevant information such as speed, position and colour. In assessment 2 this class has been changed by implementing box2D into the bullet, so it is now a body. This was done to improve collision detection.

      Initialises a bullet with a texture at the required position

              GameState state)
        Initialises a bullet with a texture at the required position
        Parameters:
        position - The position where the bullet should be drawn
        velocity - The velocity of the object which created it
        world - The world object which box2D objects are stored in
